      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LocalDate getDate​(int timeIndex)
      Returns the date for the given time index.

    • Method Detail

      • getReferenceDate

        LocalDate getReferenceDate()
        Returns:
        The reference date of this tenor, i.e., the date mapped to 0.0

        Returns:
